rules_text:
Lin, BLADE Prodigy crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater.
[i]Topple[/i] – Whenever Lin becomes tapped, you may remove a counter from a creature or artifact you control. When you do, exile the top card of your library. You may play that card until the end of your next turn.
notes: 2.2.1: A common was getting an effect that gave +1/+0 in a much more satisfying way. So I changed Lin’s effect to a topple that happens on tap.
